title: E586DS’s Wi-Fi signal is always weak.
answer:
1. When E586DS using it’s battery power, in order to save energy for longer run-time E586DS will lower down its transmit power ,so Wi-Fi signal is weaker compare with powered by USB or power adapter. Connect E586DS to power adapter or with USB cable to a running computer’s USB port will enhance E586DS’s Wi-Fi signal strength.
2. Keep E586DS at least 3 to 6 feet away from other electrical devices which may create RF signal and cause interference (for example, microwave oven, TVs, cordless/cellular phones, baby monitors or wireless speakers). If you needn’t using any of those devices when you want to connect Internet, please turn it off.
3. Wi-Fi covered range of E586DS is according to its power supply mode and its using environment. In Idea clear square area the Wi-Fi covered range of E586DS showed below:
    Use power adapter: 100m (328ft)
    Use USB cable connect: 20m (66ft)
    Use battery supply: 10m (33ft)
In actual use Wi-Fi covered range maybe different from idea square area, it decided by the environment you use. The closer to E586DS, the stronger Wi-Fi signal you get. And every obstacle (walls, ceilings, furniture) between your device and E586DS may decrease Wi-Fi signal strength. Move your device closer to E586DS can avoid obstacles and improve Wi-Fi signal.
5. Change the Wi-Fi channel to fix one other than auto (you can try the available channel one by one and select the channel with best signal strength)
